text: Ross Bagdasarian (January 27, 1919 â€“ January 16, 1972) was an American pianist, songwriter, actor, and record producer of Armenian descent. He was born in Fresno, California. During his professional life he was better known by the stage name David Seville, which he used on his recordings featuring Alvin and the Chipmunks. ==References== Category:1919 births Category:1972 deaths Category:American pianists Category:American voice actors Category:Singer-songwriters from California Category:Actors from Fresno, California Category:Musicians from Fresno, California Category:Singers from Fresno, California Category:Writers from Fresno, California Category:American record labels Category:American television actors Category:American movie actors Category:Deaths from myocardial infarction Category:American Grammy Award winners
title: Ross Bagdasarian
